panels.description:
CPU usage and resource requests in the namespace

Total Pod CPU usage is an estimate that includes both kernel and user space usage.

Allocated is the percentage of the CPU request quota that has been allocated to pods in the namespace.
panels.title: CPU Resource

panels.description:
Memory usage and resource requests in the namespace

Memory usage of the pods is from "Working Set", this excludes things like disk cache that can be evicted from resident memory.

Allocated is the percentage of the resource quota memory request that has been allocated to pods.
panels.title: Memory Resource

panels.description:
Memory usage and resource requests in the namespace

Memory usage of the pods is from "Working Set", this excludes things like disk cache that can be evicted from resident memory.

Allocated is the percentage of the resource quota memory request that has been allocated to pods.
panels.title: Memory Resource (Breakdown)

panels.description: Does not include Thanos Sidecar which runs in the Promethues Pods
panels.title: Deployments

panels.description:
Does not include Thanos Sidecar which runs in the Promethues Pods

CPU Request Usage shows the percentage of utilisation against the request value. The application can go beyond this to the limit.

Memory usage is split between the working set, rss and usage (which includes filesystem cache) and compares against limits. Whilst working set and rss are indicators of potential OOM killing the usage metric is only for considerations of performance.

targets.expr:
sum(irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace=~"gitlab-mr-wh-.*", pod=~"gitlab-mr-wh-.*", container!~"(|POD)"}[5m])) by (pod, container)
/ 
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", namespace=~"gitlab-mr-wh-.*", pod=~"gitlab-mr-wh-.*", container!~"(|POD)"}) by (pod, container)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace=~"gitlab-mr-wh-.*", pod=~"gitlab-mr-wh-.*", container!~"(|POD)"}) by (pod, container) 
/ 
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory", namespace=~"gitlab-mr-wh-.*", pod=~"gitlab-mr-wh-.*", container!~"(|POD)"}) by (pod, container)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace=~"gitlab-mr-wh-.*", pod=~"gitlab-mr-wh-.*", container!~"(|POD)"}) by (pod, container) 
/ 
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory", namespace=~"gitlab-mr-wh-.*", pod=~"gitlab-mr-wh-.*", container!~"(|POD)"}) by (pod, container)

sum(container_memory_rss{namespace=~"gitlab-mr-wh-.*", pod=~"gitlab-mr-wh-.*", container!~"(|POD)"}) by (pod, container) 
/ 
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory", namespace=~"gitlab-mr-wh-.*", pod=~"gitlab-mr-wh-.*", container!~"(|POD)"}) by (pod, container)

panels.title: Containers
